thread.title: Saif Ali Khan breaks his silence on rumours about disapproval of Sara being launched by Karan Johar | Zee News
thread.title_full: Saif Ali Khan breaks his silence on rumours about disapproval of Sara being launched by Karan Johar | Zee News

title: Saif Ali Khan breaks his silence on rumours about disapproval of Sara being launched by Karan Johar | Zee News
text:
Saif Ali Khan breaks his silence on rumours about disapproval of Sara being launched by Karan Johar By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 08:37 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Mumbai: Speculations have been rife that Saif Ali Khan had reservations about his daughter Sara Ali Khan being launched by Karan Johar. The Nawab of Pataudi, who recently appeared on the producer-director’s talk show – ‘Koffee With Karan’ to promote his upcoming film ‘Rangoon’ – has put all rumours to rest. 
Talking about Sara’s launch, Saif said, “I would love Sara to be launched by Karan Johar. He is one of the best that we have.” 
Khan also rubbished rumours about his disapproval by saying, “I keep reading various reports where I am supposedly averse to her getting launched by Karan because she will apparently become another Alia Bhatt. If Sara becomes as successful as Alia is then it will be a matter of pride and happiness for all of us.” 
Well, it is also confirmed now that the young girl will be introduced to Bollywood by KJo. She was spotted posing with her mentor at Shahid Kapoor’s pre-birthday bash recently. 
(With PTI inputs) First Published: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 08:37 More from zeenews
